scripts.lint:all: pnpm lint && for dir in packages/starter-* packages/app-*; do if [ -f "$dir/eslint.config.js" ] || [ -f "$dir/eslint.config.mjs" ]; then echo "Linting $dir..." && (cd "$dir" && npx eslint .); fi; done
scripts.type-check:all: pnpm type-check && for pkg in packages/starter-* packages/app-*; do (cd "$pkg" && pnpm run --if-present type-check); done
scripts.install:all: for pkg in packages/starter-* packages/app-*; do (cd "$pkg" && pnpm install --ignore-workspace); done
scripts.install:all:frozen: for pkg in packages/starter-* packages/app-*; do (cd "$pkg" && pnpm install --frozen-lockfile --ignore-workspace); done
scripts.check:all: pnpm install:all && pnpm format:check && pnpm lint:all && pnpm type-check:all
scripts.check:all:ci: pnpm install:all:frozen && pnpm format:check && pnpm lint:all && pnpm type-check:all
